website_summaries.verdict: Rugged, with enough style to go from day to night and keep your feet comfortable throughout the duration.
pros: We love the laces that provide a flexible fit for a variety of sizes
Available in multiple colors and designed with a heel that adds a touch of height without compromising your ability to walk
Some say the boots appear far more expensive than they actually are
cons: While comfortable above the ankle for most, the arch may be high for some

customer_reviews.title: THESE BOOTS ARE SO GREAT! IM LITERALLY SCREAMING
customer_reviews.text: THESE BOOTS ARE SO GREAT! IM LITERALLY SCREAMING! Exactly as pictured, absolutely perfect! I was afraid they wouldnt fit since Im a bigger girl with thick legs and also 6”2 so my legs are very long as well. But they fit perfectly! Surprising they were even a bit loose before lacing. Im usually a size nine but I always order up with boots. Got a size ten, and they are very roomy. I love these so much! Definitely reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: Amaranthe

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, exactly as pictured. If you're below ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, exactly as pictured. If you're below 5'5", these are going to go past your knees. I'm 4'11" and they come past my knee by 3 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Breezepelt

customer_reviews.title: Nice but......
customer_reviews.text: Not made for slightly heavier women. String did not lace all the way to the top. The buckles for the shoe strings keep attaching to each other when I walked. Very pretty tho. Hate they don’t fit right on me.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal G.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boots!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boots. Glad i took the chance and ordered these. Shipped quickly. Arrived undamaged. I'm 5'8 and wear a size 11 shoe. These fit like a glove. They stop about 2-3 inches above the knee on me which is perfect. Thinking about getting a pair in brown next.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: If you're around 5'5" and 110lbs don't bother. This product wasn't made for you.
customer_reviews.text: Cute boot. Nice fit if you have thicker legs. I wear a size 8 shoe but I have long legs on the thinner side. With all the reviews from women saying the boot fit them I decided to give these a try. Big mistake. What I received was a heel that someone apparently sewed a garbage bag to. Even lacing the boots as tight as they go I can still shove my entire arm inside of the boot. I will definitely be returning these. Waste of $30.
customer_reviews.author: Taz

customer_reviews.title: Fits but also doesn't? Worth a try though!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I only knocked off a star because towards the top, I ran out of lace and can't lace up the top now? Also its like it won't completely fit at the top? Very strange, but I gave a star back because bravo for knee-high shoes actually fitting my calves....sort of!
customer_reviews.author: Chance

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are exactly what I was looking for - fashion & comfort. I wore them to a Renaissance Faire as soon as I received them. I walked around for hours on uneven terrain and had no issues with these boots. So far, they're terrific. I hope they last.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait until I wore these enough to know their durability/comfort to write a review. I’m 5’8 and was worried they wouldn’t be over the knee on me but they were ! They’re comfortable enough to walk around all day in, and they’re exactly as described. I ordered a size 9 in black and they’re perfect. I love how adjustable they are. Can be worn casually or dressy. Only complaint I have is that they seem to wear easily, but I have a kitten at home and they weren’t too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Looks very much like suede
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute and I was very excited to see how cute they were. Not suede but looks real.
customer_reviews.author: CCI California Crime Investigator

customer_reviews.title: Sure they aren't Gucci but they aren't bad
customer_reviews.text: Holy crow!! Even though I read the reviews I was skeptical. For the price you would expect a Halloween shoe cover, but these are actually magnificent. Sure they aren't Gucci but they aren't bad boots
customer_reviews.author: Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and fanionable.
customer_reviews.text: I don't ever buy shoes or clothes online because sometimes they lool different in pictures BUT I love everything about these. The heel is perfect for long hours standing, very fashionable. I got my usual shoe size, they fir perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Ponce

customer_reviews.title: Very happy thank you
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the color premiere black i love them very nice looks like leather .Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Julee w.

customer_reviews.title: They arent thin, they're made of a more badded fabric.
customer_reviews.text: I bought my exact size 9 and they fit unbelievably perfect. I have muscular legs so they're really curvy around my calves. The tongue of the shoe is plenty wide enough to cover my shin when fastened. I got the light brown and im ordering the black now. Deffinatly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: These are so damn cute. Not too young looking (I'm 40) but still sexy. They are a must
customer_reviews.author: MBAGurl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love these, very comfortable. only drawback is that they have a weird smell to them
customer_reviews.author: Elena C

customer_reviews.title: and I am in love. Highly recommend these boots
customer_reviews.text: My first time trying over the knee boots, and I am in love. Highly recommend these boots, they're so comfortable and look amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla F

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the premier black, and I've gotten compliments since I've put the boot on. I love it, goes right at the knee and I was able to fit my large calves in the boot. That says a lot.
customer_reviews.author: KING, D.

customer_reviews.title: Great boots....
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so cute on. Not disappointed at all. Got a lot of compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: PamR

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: The boots arrived in a banged up box. The quality was poor.. Threads sticking out everywhere. Once laced up one of the boots bunched up at the calf in a very unattractive way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: They fit true to size. I take an 8. That's what I ordered and they fit. Nice leather craftsmanship. I'm happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Wilkey

customer_reviews.title: My size is 7. 5 US and it fit ...
customer_reviews.text: My size is 7.5 US and it fit perfectly. They are well made.
customer_reviews.author: Spunky_Freakster

customer_reviews.title: Picture is not what they sent!
customer_reviews.text: I order the tan pair that the picture they have is leather. I was sent these suede! Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: L. Cao

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 9 and 9 fit perfectly. <3
customer_reviews.author: Zaya

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking boot! It runs small. I take an 8.5 and bought a 9 and they fit perfect! There is 1 thing I'll mention, I have small calves and the boot was snug. Someone with a large calf might have a hard time zipping them up.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are nice boots. I ordered my regular size 8.5 and they fit as they should. The only problem I have is the listing. I ordered the Premiere Tan. According to the listing and picture, the boots should be a leather-type distressed material. That is what I wanted to purchase. Instead, I was sent some very orangey tan suede boots. Not what I wanted. It's not worth the hassle of sending them back since they were inexpensive, fit well, and I'll more than likely wear them, but the listing should definitely be changed to reflect that Premiere Tan is a suede like material, not distressed leather-type.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So unhappy
customer_reviews.text: Took a long time to ship and besides the material its totally different than the one i saw in the picture. This is birthday gift, her bday was may 6 and i ordered april 26 . I just got it today may13 and the wrong material, that one i wanted its like sintetice leather and the one a have is suede boots. Im not happy.
customer_reviews.author: ABIGAIL

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Love them!!! Very comfortable and true to size. I want the denim ones next!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Mleczynski

product_meta.title: Forever Womens Chunky Heel Lace up Over The Knee High Riding Boots
product_meta.description: Forever Link is a fashion shoe brand based in California. Forever Link offer a wide array of styles including heels, wedges, flats, shoes, sandals and boots.
